casebody.data:
HARR, Respondent, v. MOONEY, Appellant. (City Court of New York, General Term. November 18, 1898.) Action by Henry M. Harr against Christopher Mooney.

Argued before FITZSIMONS, C. J., and CONLAN and O’DWYER, JJ.

Thomas J. O’Neil and Thomas J. Purdy, for appellant. Forster, Hotaling & Klenke, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Judgment and order appealed from affirmed, with costs.
